argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psgnghm2.s | |- S = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | psgnghm2.n | |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) |
| 3 |  | psgnghm2.u | |- U = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S |`s dom N ) = ( S |`s dom N ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 4, 3 | #P_psgnghm | |- ( D e. Fin -> N e. ( ( S |`s dom N ) GrpHom U ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_sygbasnfpfi | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( D e. Fin -> A. x e. ( Base ` S ) dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin ) |
| 9 |  | #P_rabid2 | |- ( ( Base ` S ) = { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } <-> A. x e. ( Base ` S ) dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylibr | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( Base ` S ) = { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } = { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 12 | 1, 6, 11, 2 | #P_psgnfn | |- N Fn { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 13 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( N Fn { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } -> dom N = { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom N = { x e. ( Base ` S ) | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( Base ` S ) = dom N ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqimss | |- ( ( Base ` S ) = dom N -> ( Base ` S ) C_ dom N ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( SymGrp ` D ) e. _V |
| 18 | 1, 17 | #P_eqeltri | |- S e. _V |
| 19 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( pmSgn ` D ) e. _V |
| 20 | 2, 19 | #P_eqeltri | |- N e. _V |
| 21 | 20 | #P_dmex | |- dom N e. _V |
| 22 | 4, 6 | #P_ressid2 | |- ( ( ( Base ` S ) C_ dom N /\ S e. _V /\ dom N e. _V ) -> ( S |`s dom N ) = S ) |
| 23 | 18, 21, 22 | #P_mp3an23 | |- ( ( Base ` S ) C_ dom N -> ( S |`s dom N ) = S ) |
| 24 | 15, 16, 23 | #P_3syl | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( S |`s dom N ) = S ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( D e. Fin -> ( ( S |`s dom N ) GrpHom U ) = ( S GrpHom U ) ) |
| 26 | 5, 25 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( D e. Fin -> N e. ( S GrpHom U ) ) |
